import React from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; // skills import { skills } from './skills-data'; import './skills.styles.css'; const Skills = () => { return (

OTHER EVENTS

{/* Frontend */} {/* Frontend */} BRIDE MAKING CEREMONY
{skills.bride.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} A Celebration of Anticipation: Witness the Bride Making Ceremony !! A ceremony of the bride's preparation precedes the wedding. Witness the beautiful tradition of the bride making ceremony before the main event. Get ready for the giggles and happy tears! Join us for the bride's getting-ready party. Event Date : February 29th, 2024 - Morning 10 AM IST ))} {/* Frontend */} HALDI
{skills.frontend.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} HALDI Kissed !! Haldi is a pre-wedding ceremony performed a day or two before the wedding. Family members and friends playfully slather the bride and groom in a paste of turmeric, oil, and milk to prevent evil spirits from harming the to-be-wed couple. Event Date : February 29th, 2024 - Noon 12 PM IST Location : <>Bride's home ))} {/* Frontend */} MEHENDI
{skills.frontend.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} "Mehendi vibes on fleek!" The green mehendi paste is applied to the hands and feet, which house the nerve endings in the body, to help calm the bride's nerves. It signified her confinement to her home until the wedding. Event Date : February 29th, 2024 - Evening 7 PM IST ))} {/* Frontend */} GROOM WELCOME
{skills.frontend.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} HALDI Kissed !! Haldi is a pre-wedding ceremony performed a day or two before the wedding. Family members and friends playfully slather the bride and groom in a paste of turmeric, oil, and milk to prevent evil spirits from harming the to-be-wed couple. Event Date : February 17th, 2024 - Morning 7 AM IST ))} {/* Frontend */} SANGEET & RECEPTION
{skills.frontend.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} HALDI Kissed !! Haldi is a pre-wedding ceremony performed a day or two before the wedding. Family members and friends playfully slather the bride and groom in a paste of turmeric, oil, and milk to prevent evil spirits from harming the to-be-wed couple. Event Date : February 17th, 2024 - Morning 7 AM IST ))} {/* Frontend */} KALYANAM
{skills.frontend.map((skill, index) => ( <> {' '} HALDI Kissed !! Haldi is a pre-wedding ceremony performed a day or two before the wedding. Family members and friends playfully slather the bride and groom in a paste of turmeric, oil, and milk to prevent evil spirits from harming the to-be-wed couple. Event Date : February 17th, 2024 - Morning 7 AM IST ))} {/* Programming Languages */} Programming Languages
{skills.programmingLanguages.map((skill, index) => ( {' '} {skill.skillName} ))} {/* Database */} Database
{skills.databases.map((skill, index) => ( {' '} {skill.skillName} ))} {/* Version Control */} Version Control
{' '} {skills.versionControl[0].skillName} {' '} {skills.versionControl[1].skillName} {/* Monitoring Control */} Monitor control
{skills.monitoring.map((skill, index) => ( {' '} {skill.skillName} ))}
); }; export default Skills;
